sentence.Network_en: The zone boundaries zigzag capriciously according to the whims of the local population.
sentence.Network_cn: 按照当地居民的意愿,时区界线被划分得弯弯曲曲.

sentences.sentence: "there were Turk's head lilies and patches of iris , islands of brilliant blue set capriciously in the green sea"

auth_sentence.content: The Crimea was part of Russia until as recently as 1954, when Khrushchev capriciously transferred it to Ukraine.
